command.generateCommitMessage.title: Generate Commit Message
command.selectAvailableModel.title: Select Available Model
configuration.service.apiKey.description: API key for authentication with your AI service provider.
configuration.service.baseURL.descriptio: Base URL of the AI service API endpoint.
configuration.service.model.description: AI model to use for generating commit messages. Run [Commit Genie: Select Available Model](command:commit-genie.selectAvailableModel) to choose from available options.
configuration.format.customPrompt.descri: Custom prompt to append to the system message. Use this to add specific guidelines or requirements for commit message generation.
configuration.debug.enableLogging.descri: Enable logging to the Output panel for troubleshooting. Logs help diagnose issues when reporting bugs.
configuration.debug.logLevel.description: Minimum log level to display. Lower levels include all higher levels (e.g., 'info' includes 'warn' and 'error').
